description: A long, thin sword made of blue metal with a mana pearl stuck in it's hilt. The blade is made of bluesteel, a substance that's nearly impossible to find or create. It adores mana above all else, draining it from anyone it touches.

A brutal morningstar made of red metal with a mana pearl stuck in it's hilt. The blade is made of redsteel, a substance that's nearly impossible to find or create. It adores the taste of blood above all else, draining it from anyone it touches.

A long, menacing spear made of green metal with a mana pearl stuck in it's hilt. The blade and shaft are made of greensteel, a substance that's nearly impossible to find or create. It adores pain above all else, draining it from anyone it touches.

name: Greensteel Pain Drain
description: Your pain is put at bay.

A long, thin sword made of black metal with a mana pearl stuck in it's hilt. The blade is made of blacksteel, a substance that's nearly impossible to find or create. It adores death above all else, draining it from anyone it touches.

A long, thin staff made of white metal with a mana pearl stuck in it's hilt. The staff is made of whitesteel, a substance that's nearly impossible to find or create. It adores lifeforce above all else, draining it from anyone it touches.

name: Whitesteel Staff Healing
description: Health from Staff.

name: Whitesteel Staff Stamina
description: Stamina from Staff.

White leather is stretched over phantasmal hands made of soft light, and as you put it on you feel pure energy shooting through your body. It calls down bolts of pure energy when you attack while wearing it.

use_action.msg: You will the gloves to radiate light.

description: White leather is stretched over phantasmal hands made of soft light, and as you put it on you feel pure energy shooting through your body. It calls down bolts of pure energy when you attack while wearing it.

use_action.msg: You will the gloves to stop radiating light.

description: White leather is stretched over phantasmal hands made of soft light, and as you put them on you feel pure energy shooting through your body. They project a cone of pure energy when you attack while wearing them.

use_action.msg: You will the gloves to radiate light.

description: White leather is stretched over phantasmal hands made of soft light, and as you put them on you feel pure energy shooting through your body. They project a cone of pure energy when you attack while wearing them.

use_action.msg: You will the gloves to stop radiating light.

description: White leather is stretched over phantasmal hands made of soft light, and as you put them on you feel electricity shooting through your body. They project a cone of electricity when you attack while wearing them.

White leather is stretched over phantasmal hands made of soft light, and as you put it on you feel electricity shooting through your body. It calls down bolts of electricity when you attack while wearing it.
Red leather is stretched over phantasmal hands made of ash, and as you put them on you feel heat shooting through your body. They project a cone of fire when you attack while wearing them.
Red leather is stretched over phantasmal hands made of ash, and as you put it on you feel heat shooting through your body. It calls down bolts of fire when you attack while wearing it.

Blue leather is stretched over phantasmal hands made of frozen time, and as you put them on you feel cold shooting through your body. They project a cone of freezing wind when you attack while wearing them.
Blue leather is stretched over phantasmal hands made of cracking ice, and as you put it on you feel cold shooting through your body. It calls down freezing rains when you attack while wearing it.

Green leather is stretched over phantasmal hands made of liquid death, and as you put them on you feel acidic parasites shooting through your body. They project a cone of acid when you attack while wearing them.
Green leather is stretched over phantasmal hands made of ooze, and as you put it on you feel acidic parasites shooting through your body. It calls down acid showers when you attack while wearing it.
Brown leather is stretched over supple hands, and as you put them on you feel pride shooting through your body. They project a cone of bullets when you attack while wearing them.
Brown leather is stretched over worn hands, and as you put it on you feel humanity's many memories shooting through your body. It makes you have extra umph when you attack while wearing it.
Black leather is stretched over worn hands, and as you put it on you feel humanity's many memories shooting through your body. It makes your blades push deeper when you attack while wearing it.
Gray leather is stretched over worn hands, and as you put it on you feel humanity's many memories shooting through your body. It makes your blades tear off more flesh while wearing it.
A steel gauntlet that makes you feel stronger when you put it on.
A steel gauntlet that makes you feel smarter when you put it on.
A steel gauntlet that makes you feel more dextrous when you put it on.
A steel gauntlet that makes you feel more perceptive when you put it on.
A steel gauntlet that increases your maximum mana.
A steel gauntlet that increases your mana regeneration.
A steel gauntlet that increases your maximum stamina.
A steel gauntlet that increases your stamina regeneration.
A steel gauntlet that increases your maximum hp.
A steel gauntlet that increases your HP regeneration.

name: Spear of the White Wolf
description: A white wooden staff topped with a silver blade, cold to the touch. A flourish will bring the wolf's spirit forth, casting biting winds at your opponents.

name: Spear of the White Wolf
description: A white wooden staff topped with a silver blade, cold to the touch. A flourish will bring the wolf's spirit forth, casting biting winds at your opponents.
A brimstone shard with wrapping at one end so it can be safely wielded.
A large, two-handed brimstone axe normally used by fire-fighters.  It makes a powerful melee weapon, but is a bit slow to recover between swings.

pocket_data.description: Marrying strap for a Halligan bar.

description: A metal weapon made of brimstone, designed to be gripped in the palm to cause punches to do extra damage.  A good, quick weapon - but you have to get within punching range to use it.
A rare sword forged from brimstone.  Deadly against unarmored targets, and still very effective against armor.
A large, heavy hammer with a brimstone head.  A very hard-hitting melee weapon, but it's slow to swing and will probably exhaust you quickly.
Three brimstone pipes tightly fit together with some wrappings for a handle around one end and a sharp tip on the other.
